posts.post_content:
Hello all,
After a long time, I was able to upgrade the Sovereign 350 spot in the Eddie Collins group.  I am selling this low end Sovereign 350 Eddie Collins.  This card is a big one, as it measures 2.75 inches one the nose.

$OLD delivered on this one

Any form of payment is fine, but Paypal is prefered.
Thanks,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]

[URL="http://s588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/Eddie%20Collins%20cards/?action=view&current=T206SOV350CollinsFront.jpg"][IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/Eddie%20Collins%20cards/T206SOV350CollinsFront.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL="http://s588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/Eddie%20Collins%20cards/?action=view&current=T206SOV350CollinsBack.jpg"][IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/Eddie%20Collins%20cards/T206SOV350CollinsBack.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Big price drop.  Ready to move this today!
Thanks,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]
